Key Match Events: Michael Busch had his first big league multi-homer game
Kyle Hendricks allowed one run and two hits in six innings with seven strikeouts
Miscellaneous Highlights: Chicago went 3 for 14 with runners in scoring position and stranded 16 runners, tying the major league high for a nine-inning game this season
Others: Cal Quantrill made his first appearance since recovering from right triceps inflammation
Nico Hoerner had an RBI single in the third as Chicago took a 2-0 lead
Jacob Stallings hit his career-best ninth homer in the bottom half
Pete Crow-Armstrong hit a two-run homer in the ninth, his 10th home run this season
Colorado pitchers walked 12 for the first time since a 12-11 win over Milwaukee on June 5, 1999
Tyson Miller then struck out Brendan Rodgers and Ezequiel Tovar for his first career save in four big league seasons
